dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT INITCAP(:P_TYPE) req_type ,to_char(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),'DD-MON-RRRR') AS_OF_DATE ,:P_MAIL_TO MAIL_TO ,:P_SMTP_SERVER SMTP_SERVER ,:P_MAIL_FROM FROM_EMAIL ,XX_AR_SELF_SERVICE.get_std_message(:P_TYPE,'SUBJECT') SUBJECT ,XX_AR_SELF_SERVICE.get_std_message(:P_TYPE,'FILENAME') FILENAME ,XX_AR_SELF_SERVICE.get_std_message(:P_TYPE,'BODY') MSGBODY FROM DUAL

SELECT DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored') Type ,DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) ,count(0) cnt FROM xx_ar_self_serv_bad_addr WHERE TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND :P_TYPE = 'ADDRESS' AND aops_account is not null GROUP BY DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored'),DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) UNION SELECT DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored') Type ,DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) ,count(0) cnt FROM xx_ar_self_serv_bad_contact WHERE TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND :P_TYPE = 'CONTACT' AND aops_account is not null GROUP BY DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored'),DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) UNION SELECT DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored') Type ,DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) ,count(0) cnt FROM XX_AR_SELF_SERV_BAD_EMAIL WHERE TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND :P_TYPE = 'EMAIL' AND aops_account is not null GROUP BY DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S','Direct Success','Direct Errors') ,'N','Indirect' ,'Errored'),DECODE (DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(status,'S',1,2),'N',3,4) order by 2

SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME, AOPS_ACCOUNT, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, CREATION_DATE, REQUEST_ID, DIRECT_BILL_FLAG, COUNTRY, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, INVOICE_DATE, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y','Direct','N','Indirect','Errored') REC_TYPE, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(Status,'S','Sent','Send Error'),'N','NA','Error') SentToPG FROM xx_ar_self_serv_bad_addr WHERE 1=1 AND TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND aops_account is not null AND :P_TYPE = 'ADDRESS' ORDER BY DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',1,'N',2,3),8 desc,2

SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME, AOPS_ACCOUNT, EMAIL_ADDRESS, CREATION_DATE, REQUEST_ID, DIRECT_BILL_FLAG, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y','Direct','N','Indirect','Errored') REC_TYPE, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(Status,'S','Sent','Send Error'),'N','NA','Error') SentToPG FROM XX_AR_SELF_SERV_BAD_EMAIL WHERE 1=1 AND aops_account is not null AND TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND :P_TYPE = 'EMAIL' ORDER BY DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',1,'N',2,3),4 desc,2

SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME, AOPS_ACCOUNT, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, FAX_NUMBER, EMAIL_ADDRESS, CREATION_DATE, REQUEST_ID, DIRECT_BILL_FLAG, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y','Direct','N','Indirect','Errored') REC_TYPE, DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',DECODE(Status,'S','Sent','Send Error'),'N','NA','Error') SentToPG FROM xx_ar_self_serv_bad_contact WHERE 1=1 AND TRUNC(CREATION_DATE) >= TRUNC(NVL(fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(:P_AS_OF_DATE),CREATION_DATE)) AND aops_account is not null AND :P_TYPE = 'CONTACT' ORDER BY DECODE(DIRECT_BILL_FLAG,'Y',1,'N',2,3),8 desc,2
